questions.text: Summarize the main goals described in the document.
What decisions were made about timeline or milestones?
List the open questions mentioned so far.
What risks are documented and how are they mitigated?
Extract any glossary terms and their definitions.
Which stakeholders are mentioned and what are their roles?
Provide a short action plan based on the current document content.
Compare two options discussed in the doc and recommend one.
What is the current status and next steps?
Give a brief overview of the document structure (sections).
Rewrite the last paragraph in a more concise style.
What dependencies are listed?
Identify any contradictions or inconsistencies.
What KPIs or metrics are mentioned?
Draft an executive summary based strictly on the document.
Find the section about roles and responsibilities.
What are the key constraints stated?
List any timelines or dates mentioned.
Which tools or systems are referenced?
Provide a oneâ€‘page meeting brief from the document.
Suggest a checklist based on the documented process.
Extract the definition of done if present.
Summarize the latest decisions and rationale.
What assumptions are explicitly stated?
Propose a risk register using only the documented risks.
How is success measured according to the document?
List the main deliverables and their owners.
Extract any decisions about budget or resources.
What are the unresolved questions the doc hints at?
Provide a short FAQ based on the document.
